law.catch_line: In this Part V of this subtitle, "per diem" means the amount to be paid for all of the time from mid...
law.text: In this Part V of this subtitle, "per diem" means the amount to be paid for all of the time from midnight through a 24-hour period for which a circuit court requires a prospective, qualified, or sworn juror to be in attendance at or in proximity to the circuit court.
